Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Moscow (Moskvorechye-Saburovo), Intourist Kolomenskoe is convenient to Kolomenskoye Church of the Ascension and Church of the Ascension. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Kolomenskoye Historical and Architectural Museum and Reserve and Tsarytsino Open-Air History and Architectural Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 259 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Intourist Kolomenskoe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Moscow? This hotel has 6133 square feet (570 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Intourist Kolomenskoe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Moscow (Moskvorechye-Saburovo), Intourist Kolomenskoe is convenient to Kolomenskoye Church of the Ascension and Church of the Ascension. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Kolomenskoye Historical and Architectural Museum and Reserve and Tsarytsino Open-Air History and Architectural Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kolomenskoye Church of the Ascension - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Church of the Ascension - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Kolomenskoye Historical and Architectural Museum and Reserve - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Tsarytsino Open-Air History and Architectural Museum - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Kant Ski Slope - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Bitsa Park - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Simonov Monastery - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Danilov Monastery - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
State Darwin Museum - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Teatrium na Serpukhovke - 8.6 km / 5.4 mi
Kuzminki Park - 8.8 km / 5.4 mi
Donskoy Monastery - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Shukhov Tower - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Forum Hall - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Krutitskoye Podvorye - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi

The preferred airport for Intourist Kolomenskoe is Moscow (DME-Domodedovo Intl.) - 29.5 km / 18.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. Rates are based on existing bedding only. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.
